content:
ITEM NO.25               COURT NO.12               SECTION XVI
               S U P R E M E  C O U R T  O F  I N D I A
                       RECORD OF PROCEEDINGS
SPECIAL LEAVE PETITION (CIVIL) Diary No(s). 2572/2025
[Arising out of impugned final judgment and order dated  29-07-2024
in CO No. 94/2024 passed by the High Court of Calcutta Circuit 
Bench at Jalpaiguri]
RAJENDRA PRASAD                                    Petitioner(s)
                                VERSUS
RAJ KISHORE PRASAD & ANR.                          Respondent(s)
IA No. 148789/2025 - CONDONATION OF DELAY IN FILING
IA No. 148790/2025 - CONDONATION OF DELAY IN REFILING /  CURING THE
DEFECTS
 
Date : 07-07-2025 This matter was called on for hearing today.
CORAM :  HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE PANKAJ MITHAL
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE K.V. VISWANATHAN
[PARTIAL COURT WORKING DAYS BENCH]
For Petitioner(s)  Mr. Gautam Das, AOR
                   
For Respondent(s)  
          UPON hearing the counsel the Court made the following
                             O R D E R
1.Heard learned counsel for the petitioner.
2.Delay  condoned.  I.A.Nos.  148789  and  148790  of  2025  are
allowed.
3.The application of the petitioner for amending the written
statement in a probate case has been rejected by the Court(s)
below.
4.In view of the facts and circumstances of the case, we do not
find it necessary to interfere with such an order at this stage.
Accordingly, the Special Leave Petition is dismissed.
5.Pending application(s), if any, shall stand disposed of.
(VARSHA MENDIRATTA)                             (NIDHI MATHUR)
COURT MASTER (SH)                             COURT MASTER (NSH)
